metadata.name: The hanged dream #01
metadata.description:
Documentary photography of the historical process of decay of one of the most important cities of Latinamerica: Caracas. Digital photography. 3648 px x 2736 px. One (1) JPG file. 1/1 artwork.

Includes original fine art Hahnemühle copy (30cm x 23cm). Contact azaliad.licons@gmail.com for worldwide shipping arrangement.   
  
The hanged dream brings together two photographic archives, taking a fragment of Caracas modernity in two moments: the material remains of a dream that did not overcome the hard test of time, in a society that did not know what to do with it. future, and that future embodied in a totem that from a dream built of modernity ended up being part of the historical failure of a nation, there nestled in a mountain, the natural landscape has not been enough …
